name: axe-webdriverjs-demo
description: How to set up aXe with WebdriverJS for automated testing.

scripts.testall: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/*.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test1: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testHome.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test2: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testFilings.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test3: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testSchedules.js && echo ok || echo not ok
